## [1.0.0] - 2026-02-03

### Features

- Initial release
- `config_dir()` - platform-specific config directory
- `data_dir()` - platform-specific data directory
- `cache_dir()` - platform-specific cache directory
- `favor-xdg-style` feature for XDG paths on macOS
